body_html: @DjangoPeng They're called parameter servers because that's where the parameters are stored. If you have one of them, all of the variables with be divided among the 1 parameter servers, which means all of the variables will go on the same machine.

body: @DjangoPeng They're called parameter servers because that's where the parameters are stored.  If you have one of them, all of the variables with be divided among the 1 parameter servers, which means all of the variables will go on the same machine.
